author: lzybkr
body:
I created a VS2017 solution file for the powershell-win-core csproj and everything it references.

It "upgraded" each csproj - but I reverted all changes but the one to suppress future upgrades.

The solution doesn't build and I haven't investigated why, but it's useful for editing across the entire project.
